attributes.action: Resign and Call a General Election - Listen to the will of the People.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With growing distrust of party political members over alledged funding irregularities, increasing Fuel and Council Taxes, Failing Health, Schooling and Police Services, Pensions in Crisis and a Bank out of Control. We the undersigned would like to cast a 'Vote of No Confidence' in the current administration.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
